name: Shriddle: shape riddle
description:
Shriddle is a simple yet challenging puzzle game. Solve the riddle as quick as possible. Train your brain while having fun.
Ideal casual game, because the game levels are short and can be paused at any time.

- 3 different element shapes are available: rectangle, triangle, hexagon.
- Adjustable game difficulty
- Player stats with level timings.
- Clear, minimalistic design.
